member.name: T:CommandExitCodes
member.summary: Exit Codes returned from Coverlet console process.

member.name: F:CommandExitCodes.Success
member.summary: Indicates successful run of dotnet test without any test failure and coverage percentage above threshold if provided.

member.name: F:CommandExitCodes.TestFailed
member.summary: Indicates test failure by dotnet test.

member.name: F:CommandExitCodes.CoverageBelowThreshold
member.summary: Indicates coverage percentage is below given threshold for one or more threshold type.

member.name: F:CommandExitCodes.Exception
member.summary: Indicates exception occurred during Coverlet process.

member.name: F:CommandExitCodes.CommandParsingException
member.summary: Indicates missing options or empty arguments for Coverlet process.

member.name: F:Coverlet.Console.Logging.LogLevel.Detailed
member.summary: Logs that track the general flow of the application. These logs should have long-term value.

member.name: F:Coverlet.Console.Logging.LogLevel.Normal
member.summary: Logs that highlight an abnormal or unexpected event in the application flow, but do not otherwise cause the application execution to stop.

member.name: F:Coverlet.Console.Logging.LogLevel.Minimal
member.summary: Logs that highlight when the current flow of execution is stopped due to a failure. These should indicate a failure in the current activity, not an application-wide failure.

member.name: F:Coverlet.Console.Logging.LogLevel.Quiet
member.summary: Not used for writing log messages. Specifies that a logging category should not write any messages except warning and errors.
